author: Koori Graywolf

text:
Meanwhile, Ixrec of Amaterasu Translations already said, that he will do ALL of the Steampunk series. So... be patient, once he will finish Comyu, he will do it.
You can also play Sekien no Inganock and Shikokku no Sharnoth from the same series, which were already translated by him.
author: Autentist

text:
Jesus Christ, people, you don't know jack shit, do you? 
Souten no Celenaria is NOT your typical game. It's a visual novel, which means that It's more like a book, than a game.
It's also a part of the "Steampunk Series", developed by Liar-Soft. While It's true, that there may be a NA release and some negotiations with JAST may take place, It's not confirmed at all. For visual novels this is a pain in the ass, because they have a small number of fans abroad.
author: Autentist
